mdRecord.dcterms:title: Barter Theatre: July 23 thru 27
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Poster shows at the Barter Theatre. Productions include: Arms and the Man, July 23 | My Sister Eileen, July 24 | Arms and the Man, July 25 | Blithe Spirit, July 26 | My Sister Eileen, July 27. Note: Purchase a season subscription book. Ten tickets for the price of six.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
